imdb.plot outline: Corall is a project that explores the world of the so-called magic reality amid the ideal boundary between reality and fantasy. Corall has no actors, only real witnesses who want to share their emotions in front of camera and willing to show us how they cope with life. Corall is not a documentary, the facts are the basis on which the witnesses and spectators have to interact with each experience and evoke emotions, sensations. Corall is a visual story.
imdb.title: Corall
plot: _Corall_ (qv) is a project that explores the world of the so-called magic reality amid the ideal boundary between reality and fantasy. _Corall_ (qv) has no actors, only real witnesses who want to share their emotions in front of camera and willing to show us how they cope with life. _Corall_ (qv) is not a documentary, the facts are the basis on which the witnesses and spectators have to interact with each experience and evoke emotions, sensations. _Corall_ (qv) is a visual story.::_Corall_ (qv)
